channel.title: Operation Skillage
channel.description:
I need somebody who assists / help me coding all skills from nothing ;] I've already done 90% fishing like in RS :P Ive only have to add Random events(But CBA to add them) If im ready im going over to minigames ... CastlewarsHandler , Mage arena , Fight pit handler
Some things: - We dont stuff everything in client.java - We make files like Fishing.java , Smithing.java , ... - We dont leech stuff - We'll import it later onto a server
PM me if intrested ! Only skilled ones. That's it.
Post any idea's & suggestions to , Thank-you.

I need somebody who assists / help me coding all skills from nothing ;]
